alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Tallapoosa and southwestern Chambers Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jacksons` Gap to La Fayette. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dadeville, Camp Hill, Lafayette, La Fayette, Jacksons` Gap, Waverly, Cusseta, Chambers County Lake, Eastern Lake Martin, Denson, Sturkie, Oak Bowery, Ridge Grove, Still Waters Resort, West Chambers, Southern Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Huguley, Susannah Crossing and Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
